questions.question: How many languages are used in the world today?
questions.correctText: About 7,000 languages are used in the world!

questions.question: How many of those languages are waiting for a Bible translation to begin?
Which continent has the greatest need for new Bible translation work?
questions.correctText: Africa has over 600 languages awaiting Bible translation.

questions.question: Which continent has the second greatest need for new Bible translation work?
Which continent has the third greatest need for new Bible translation work?
questions.correctText: The Pacific needs over 300 Bible translation projects.
